name: mern-graphql-demo
description: This is a basic demo website of a classic authenticated websites.  A MERN stack application with a MongoDB database, Node backend, Apollo and Express to handle data and a slick React front-end with a Vite Server.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
